Dear ${object.fname} ${object.lname},

Your application for admission as a graduate student at the American University of Nigeria for ${object.sem_id.name.name}, ${object.sem_id.year} intake has been successful. You will be joining a group of scholars with a wide range of industrial experiences, guided by world class faculty from over 25 countries on our campus. Your official acceptance letter will be sent to your email ${object.email}.

To confirm and secure your admission, you are advised to pay either your full tuition for ${object.sem_id.name.name} or an acceptance deposit of N50,000 (fifty thousand naira only) into the American University of Nigeria's account specified in your Tuition and Fees document. Please send a copy of your evidence of payment to us at graduate.admissions@aun.edu.ng. Your acceptance deposit is part of your tuition and you will receive full credit for it when you make your full tuition payment.

For further inquiries please call +234805 226 6398.

Welcome to AUN and we look forward to receiving you on campus.

Thank you

Dean School of Graduate Studies

American University of Nigeria (AUN)

Regards. 

--
